title: Augmented Matrix
text: First, write the system of equations as an Augmented matrix.

title: Augmented Matrix
text: How do you write the system as an Augmented matrix?

title: Use a calculator
text: On the matrix page of the calculator, enter the augmented matrix above as the matrix variable [A].

title: Use a calculator
text: Use the ref( function in the calculator, calling up the matrix variable [A]. ref([A])

title: Translate
text: Using the matrix the calculator outputted, transform the matrix to a system, using spaces to seperate the equations.

subHints.title: Answer
subHints.text: The answer is $$x+\frac{3}{5} y+\frac{9}{5} z=\frac{1}{5}$$ $$y+\frac{13}{21} z=-\left(\frac{4}{7}\right)$$ $$z=-\left(\frac{24}{187}\right)$$.

title: Back-substitute
text: Use back substitution to solve the system.

title: Answer
text: Therefore, the answer to the system of equations is $$\frac{61}{187}-\frac{92}{187}-\frac{24}{187}$$.
